definition: Yang Yuhuan 楊玉環|杨玉环[Yang2 Yu4 huan2] or Yang Guifei (719-756), famous Tang beauty, consort of Emperor Xuanzhong 唐玄宗[Tang2 Xuan2 zong1], blamed for extravagance and killed as a scapegoat during the An-Shi Rebellion 安史之亂|安史之乱[An1 Shi3 zhi1 Luan4]
The Drunken Beauty, Qing Dynasty Beijing opera

sentences.english: I watched the "Drunken Beauty" with Aunt Shirley days ago.
sentences.chinese: 前几天我和雪莉阿姨一起看了“贵妃醉酒”。

sentences.english: Yang Guifei was a real national beauty.
Tang prepares a small feast for Yang in the imperial garden.
sentences.chinese: 唐明皇在御花园中为杨贵妃设下小宴。

sentences.english: This site used to be the private baths for Yang Guifei, favorite concubine of the Tang emperor.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以到杨贵妃洗澡的华清池去洗温泉澡。

sentences.english: Many imperial concubines saw the royal concubineses all do like this, in succession quiet to have not another mention what.
sentences.chinese: 众妃嫔见贵妃都这样做了，纷纷噤声没有再说什么。

sentences.english: Yang Guifei liked the sweet litchis very much.
sentences.chinese: 美味的荔枝深得杨贵妃的喜爱。

sentences.english: Dark, such as bathing chaise, light-colored like Huan yarn.
sentences.chinese: 深色的如出浴贵妃，浅色的像涣纱西施。

sentences.english: Without any other choice, Yang hangs herself on a pear tree.
sentences.chinese: 无奈之下，杨贵妃自缢于梨花树下。

sentences.english: He once presented litchis from here as a tribute to Emperor Tang Xuanzong's concubine, Yang Guifei.
sentences.chinese: 他曾经把这里的荔枝进贡给唐玄宗的妃子杨贵妃吃。

sentences.english: Drunken Beauty downtown Red, send a ray of sweet gospel, flowers are blooming to be king return.
sentences.chinese: 贵妃醉酒闹红尘，一缕芬芳送福音，山花烂漫待君归。

sentences.english: Concubine Yang was Emperor Xuanzong's favorite concubine in the Tang Dynasty and she was also one of Four Great Beauties in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 杨贵妃是唐玄宗皇帝的爱妃，也是中国四大美人之一。

sentences.english: The high-ranking Imperial Concubine Yang was a plump beauty in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 杨贵妃的体态充盈，是个唐代的美人。

sentences.english: I watched the “Drunken Beauty” with Aunt Shirley days ago.
sentences.chinese: 前几天我和雪莉阿姨一起看了“贵妃醉酒”。

sentences.english: Since Emperor Tang does not return to the palace, beauty Yang becomes angry and drinks her sorrows away.
sentences.chinese: 杨贵妃因唐明皇夜不回宫，心底生怨，借酒浇愁。

sentences.english: Women chubby beauty was adored in ancient Tang Dynasty in China, and the typical girl was Yang Guifei.
sentences.chinese: 中国唐朝崇尚丰膄婀娜之美，以杨贵妃为典型。

sentences.english: About chun the imperial concubine imperial concubine eat eat grapefruit, is actually borrow ridicule her.
sentences.chinese: 炎贵妃约淳贵妃赏花吃柚，其实是借意奚落她。

definition: see 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1]

Yang Yuhuan 楊玉環|杨玉环[Yang2 Yu4 huan2] or Yang Guifei (719-756), famous Tang beauty, consort of Emperor Xuanzhong 唐玄宗[Tang2 Xuan2 zong1], blamed for extravagance and killed as a scapegoat during the An-Shi Rebellion 安史之亂|安史之乱[An1 Shi3 zhi1 Luan4]
personal name of seventh Tang emperor Xuanzong 唐玄宗[Tang2 Xuan2 zong1] (685-762), reigned 712-756
the emperor/Your majesty the emperor/His imperial majesty
Princess Taiping (c. 665-713), Tang Dynasty princess, politically powerful and known for her beauty
